title: JPMorgan says buy that S&P 500 dip, but you might want to look at this chart first
text:
IPO market braces for 14 deals this week — including payment processor Toast — unless Evergrande woes send issuers scurrying

The U.S. initial public offering market is bracing for another busy week with 14 deals on tap, unless fears of contagion from a possible default by Chinese property giant Evergrande lead issuers to postpone plans. See full story.

I've always worked for what I have, but married into money. My in-laws want to buy us a house and luxury car — the fights are endless

'I am very proud of where I am. I have my car, I pay my own rent, and I have a well-paying job in the finance world.' See full story.

New-home construction activity improves, as builders focus on high-margin projects

Housing starts increased almost exclusively due to an uptick in the construction of multifamily buildings. See full story.

The Villages is a retirement ‘paradise' — so why is that a problem?

'If communities like The Villages represent the future of aging, please count me out' — Why an expert on aging has concerns about this type of 55+ residence. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

Adam Harris's new book, 'The State Must Provide,' highlights the implications of underfunding colleges that serve Black students. See full story.
